entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
